mapper.select: select USER_ID, USER_CODE, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, SEX, AGE, ENTRY_DATE, DIMISSION_DATE, PHONE_TEL, EMAIL, USER_CREATION_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, USER_CREATED_BY, USER_LAST_UPDATE_TIME, USER_STATUS from PS_CONSUMER where USER_CODE=#{userCode} and USER_PASSWORD=#{userPassword}
mapper.insert: insert into PS_CONSUMER (USER_ID, USER_CODE, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, SEX, AGE, ENTRY_DATE, DIMISSION_DATE, PHONE_TEL, EMAIL, USER_CREATION_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, USER_CREATED_BY, USER_LAST_UPDATE_TIME, USER_STATUS ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{entryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dimissionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{phoneTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCreationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userCreatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userLastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update PS_CONSUMER set USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, AGE = #{age,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ENTRY_DATE = #{entryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DIMISSION_DATE = #{dimissionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PHONE_TEL = #{phoneTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_CREATION_TIME = #{userCreationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USER_CREATED_BY = #{userCreatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{userLastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USER_STATUS = #{userStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select USER_ID, USER_CODE, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, SEX, AGE, ENTRY_DATE, DIMISSION_DATE, PHONE_TEL, EMAIL, USER_CREATION_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, USER_CREATED_BY, USER_LAST_UPDATE_TIME, USER_STATUS from PS_CONSUMER where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select USER_ID, USER_CODE, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, SEX, AGE, ENTRY_DATE, DIMISSION_DATE, PHONE_TEL, EMAIL, USER_CREATION_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, USER_CREATED_BY, USER_LAST_UPDATE_TIME, USER_STATUS from PS_CONSUMER
